name: INVAS_CARC_BREAST
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76012-INVASIVE CARCINOMA OF THE BREAST: Complete Excision (Less Than Total Mastectomy, Including Specimens Designated Biopsy, Lumpectomy, Quadrantectomy, and Partial Mastectomy With or Without Axillary Contents) and Mastectomy (Total, Modified Radical, Radical With or Without Axillary Contents).

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: TUMOR_SITE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify tumor site.

columns.name: CLOCK_POSITION_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Clock Position of Tumor Site.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPEC_INTEGRITY_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specimen Integrity.
entries: Single intact specimen (margins can be evaluated)
Multiple designated specimens (e.g., main excision and identified margins)
Fragmented (margins cannot be evaluated with certainty)

columns.name: SPEC_INTEGRITY_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify specimen integrity.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: SPEC_SIZE_GREATEST
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specimen Greatest Size.

columns.name: SPEC_SIZE_ADDL
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specimen size additional dimension (length).

columns.name: SPEC_SIZE_ADDL2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specimen size additional dimension (width).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_GREAT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Greatest Size.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (length).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (width).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Tumor Size.

columns.name: DERML_LYM_VAS_INV_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Dermal Lymph-Vascular Invasion.

columns.name: RADIOLOG_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Radiologic Findings.

columns.name: HST_BRST_CANCR_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Prior History of Breast Cancer.

columns.name: PRESRG_INV_CNM_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Prior Presurgical (neoadjuvant) Therapy for this Diagnosis of Invasive Carcinoma.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_OTHER_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify other specimen.

columns.name: LYMPH_ND_SAMPL_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify lymph node sampling.

columns.name: DCIS_IS_PRESENT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Is Present.
entries: Only DCIS is present after presurgical (neoadjuvant) therapy

columns.name: LOBUL_CARC_IN_SIT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Lobular Carcinoma In Situ (LCIS).

columns.name: HIST_INV_CARC_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Type of Invasive Carcinoma.
entries: Ductal carcinoma in situ with microinvasion
Lobular carcinoma in situ with microinvasion
Ductal carcinoma in situ involving nipple skin (Paget disease) with microinvasion
Invasive ductal carcinoma (no special type or not otherwise specified)
Invasive carcinoma with ductal and lobular features ("Mixed type carcinoma")
Invasive carcinoma, type cannot be determined

columns.name: HIST_INV_CARC_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Histologic Type of Invasive Carcinoma.

columns.name: SIZE_DCIS_GREAT_DIM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estimated Size of Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Greatest Dimension.

columns.name: DCIS_ADDL_DIMENSION
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Additional Dimension Length.

columns.name: DCIS_ADDL_DIM_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Additional Dimension Width.

columns.name: NUM_BLOCK_EXAM_DCIS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Number of Blocks Examined for Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS).

columns.name: NUM_BLOCKS_DCIS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Number of Blocks With Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS).

columns.name: ARCHITECT_PAT_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Architectural Patterns.

columns.name: NUCLEAR_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Nuclear Grade.

columns.name: NECROSIS_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Necrosis.
entries: Present, focal (small foci or single cell necrosis)

columns.name: GLANDUL_TUBL_DIFF_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Glandular (Acinar) / Tubular Differentiation.
entries: Score 1: > 75% of tumor area forming glandular / tubular structures
Score 2: 10 to 75% of tumor area forming glandular / tubular structures
Score 3: < 10% of tumor area forming glandular / tubular structures

columns.name: NUCLEAR_PLEOMRPHS_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Nuclear Pleomorphism.
entries: Score 1: Nuclei small with little increase in size in comparison with normal breast
Score 2: Cells larger than normal with open vesicular nuclei, visible nucleoli, and
Score 3: Vesicular nuclei, often with prominent nucleoli, exhibiting marked variation

columns.name: MITOTIC_COUNT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Mitotic Count.

columns.name: NUM_MITOSE_10_H_PWR
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Number of Mitoses per 10 High-Power Fields.

columns.name: DIAMETR_MICRSCP_FLD
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Diameter of Microscope Field.

columns.name: HIST_OVERALL_GRD_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Grade - Overall Grade.

columns.name: TMR_DUCT_CARC_SIT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS).

columns.name: TMR_NO_RESID_CAR_YN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor No Residual Invasive Carcinoma After Presurgical (Neoadjuvant) Therapy for the Presence of Invasive Carcinoma section.

columns.name: MICROINVASN_ONLY_YN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Microinvasion Only.

columns.name: TMR_FOC_NUM_FOCI
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Focality Number of Foci.

columns.name: TMR_FOC_SZ_IND_FOCI
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Focality Size of Individual Foci.

columns.name: EXTENT_TMR_NIPPLE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Extent of Tumor - Nipple.
entries: DCIS does not involve the nipple epidermis.
DCIS involves nipple epidermis (Paget disease of the nipple)

columns.name: EXT_TMR_SKEL_MUSC_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Extent of Tumor - Skeletal Muscle.
entries: Skeletal muscle is present and is free of carcinoma
Carcinoma invades into skeletal muscle and into the chest wall (classified as T4a)

columns.name: MRG_INV_CARCINOMA_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Margin Invasive Carcinoma.
entries: Tumor present at surgical margin of optic nerve
Margin involvement by tumor not identified
Sarcoma involvement of margins not identified
Margins uninvolved by carcinoma in situ
Margins involved by carcinoma in situ

columns.name: MARGIN_DCIS_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Margin Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS).

columns.name: INV_CARC_CLOSE_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Distance from Closest Margin.

columns.name: INV_CARC_SUPER_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Distance to Superior Margin.

columns.name: INV_CARC_INFER_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Distance to Inferior Margin.

columns.name: INV_CARC_ANTER_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Distance to Anterior Margin.

columns.name: INV_CARC_POSTR_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Distance to Posterior Margin.

columns.name: INV_CARC_MEDIAL_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Distance to Medial Margin.

columns.name: INV_CARC_LATER_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Distance to Lateral Margin.

columns.name: INV_CARC_OTHER_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Distance from Other Specified Margin.

columns.name: INV_CARC_DESIGNAT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Designation of Other Margin.

columns.name: INV_SUPER_MRG_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Superior Margin Extent.

columns.name: INV_INFER_MRG_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Inferior Margin Extent.

columns.name: INV_ANTER_MRG_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Anterior Margin Extent.

columns.name: INV_POSTR_MRG_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Posterior Margin Extent.

columns.name: INV_MEDL_MRG_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Medial Margin Extent.

columns.name: INV_LATER_MRG_EX_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Lateral Margin Extent.

columns.name: DCIS_CLOSEST_MARGIN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Distance from Closest Margin.

columns.name: DCIS_SUPERIOR_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Distance to Superior Margin.

columns.name: DCIS_INFERIOR_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Distance to Inferior Margin.

columns.name: DCIS_ANTERIOR_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS)  Distance to Anterior Margin.

columns.name: DCIS_POSTERIOR_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Distance to Posterior margin.

columns.name: DCIS_MEDIAL_MARGIN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Distance to Medial Margin.

columns.name: DCIS_LATERAL_MARGIN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Distance to Lateral Margin.

columns.name: DCIS_OTHER_MARGIN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Distance from Other Specified margin.

columns.name: DCIS_DESIGNAT_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Designation of Margin.

columns.name: DCIS_SUPERIOR_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Superior Margin Extent.

columns.name: DCIS_INFERIOR_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS)  Inferior Margin Extent.

columns.name: DCIS_ANTERIOR_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS)  Anterior Margin Extent.

columns.name: DCIS_POSTERR_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Posterior Margin Extent.

columns.name: DCIS_MEDIAL_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Medial Margin Extent.

columns.name: DCIS_LATER_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) Lateral Margin Extent.

columns.name: TREAT_EFF_BREAST_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Treatment Effect - Neoadjuvant Therapy In The Breast.
entries: No definite response to presurgical therapy in the invasive carcinoma
Probable or definite response to presurgical therapy in the invasive carcinoma
No residual invasive carcinoma is present in the breast after presurgical therapy

columns.name: TREAT_EFF_LYMPH_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Treatment Effect Neoadjuvant Therapy In The Lymph Nodes.
entries: No definite response to presurgical therapy in metastatic carcinoma
Probable or definite response to presurgical therapy in metastatic carcinoma
No lymph node metastases; Fibrous scarring, possibly related to prior metastasis
No lymph node metastases and no prominent fibrous scarring in the nodes

columns.name: LYM_ND_NOT_PRES_YN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Lymph Nodes Present in Specimen.

columns.name: TOT_NUM_LYM_ND_EXAM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Total Number of Lymph Nodes Examined (Sentinel and Nonsentinel).

columns.name: NUM_LYM_ND_ISO_TMR
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Number of Lymph Nodes with Isolated Tumor Cells.

columns.name: MIC_MC_METAS_PRE_YN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Micro/Macro Metastases Present.

columns.name: NUM_LYM_ND_MACROMET
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Number of Lymph Nodes with Macrometastases.

columns.name: NUM_LYM_ND_MICROMET
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Number of Lymph Nodes with Micrometastases.

columns.name: SZ_LRGST_METAS_DEP
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Size of Largest Metastatic Deposit.

columns.name: LYMPH_NODES_UNITS_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Lymph Nodes - Specify Units.

columns.name: SENT_BIOP_NT_PER_YN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Sentinel Lymph Node - Biopsy Not Performed.

columns.name: LYM_ND_EXNDL_EXT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Lymph Nodes, Extranodal Extension.
entries: Present in vessels of parenchyma outside of tumor nodules

columns.name: NUM_SENT_LYM_EXAM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Number of Sentinel Lymph Nodes Examined.

columns.name: EVAL_SENT_ND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Method of Evaluation of Sentinel Lymph Nodes.

columns.name: ESTRGN_RECEPTOR_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor.

columns.name: ESTRGN_RECP_PERF_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor Performed.

columns.name: ESTROGEN_RECP_SPEC
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor - Specify Performed Specimen.

columns.name: ESTRGN_RECP_PERCN_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor Results (percentage of cells).
entries: Less than 1% immunoreactive tumor cells present

columns.name: ESTRGN_RECP_AVG_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor Results (average intensity of tumor cell nuclei staining).
